1: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּתְחַ֥ר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>Fret</n> בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים <sup>7489 </sup> <n>not thyself because of evildoers</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>be not</n> תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א <sup>7065 </sup> <n>neither be thou envious</n> בְּעֹשֵׂ֥י <sup>6213 </sup> <n>against the workers</n> עַוְלָֽה׃ <sup>5766 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n>
2: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>like</n> כֶ֭חָצִיר <sup>2682 </sup> <n>like the grass</n> מְהֵרָ֣ה <sup>4120 </sup> <n>For they shall soon</n> יִמָּ֑לוּ <sup>5243 </sup> <n>be cut down</n> וּכְיֶ֥רֶק <sup>3418 </sup> <n>as the green</n> דֶּ֝֗שֶׁא <sup>1877 </sup> <n>herb</n> יִבּוֹלֽוּן׃ <sup>5034 </sup> <n>and wither</n>
3: בְּטַ֣ח <sup>982 </sup> <n>Trust</n> בַּֽ֭יהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> וַעֲשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> שְׁכָן־ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>[so] shalt thou dwell</n> אֶ֝֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> וּרְעֵ֥ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>thou shalt be fed</n> אֱמוּנָֽה׃ <sup>530 </sup> <n>and verily</n>
4: וְהִתְעַנַּ֥ג <sup>6026 </sup> <n>Delight</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>thyself also in the LORD</n> וְיִֽתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he shall give</n> לְ֝ךָ֗ מִשְׁאֲלֹ֥ת <sup>4862 </sup> <n>thee the desires</n> לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>of thine heart</n>
5: גּ֣וֹל <sup>1556 </sup> <n>Commit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thy way</n> וּבְטַ֥ח <sup>982 </sup> <n>trust</n> עָ֝לָ֗יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and He</n> יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>also in him and he shall bring [it] to pass</n>
6: וְהוֹצִ֣יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And he shall bring forth</n> כָא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>as the light</n> צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>thy righteousness</n> וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטֶ֗ךָ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and thy judgment</n> כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <sup>6672 </sup> <n>as the noonday</n>
7: דּ֤וֹם ׀ <sup>1826 </sup> <n>Rest</n> לַיהוָה֮ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> וְהִתְח֪וֹלֵ֫ל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>and wait patiently</n> ל֥וֹ אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֭תְחַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>for him fret</n> בְּמַצְלִ֣יחַ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>not thyself because of him who prospereth</n> דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his way</n> בְּ֝אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>because of the man</n> עֹשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to pass</n> מְזִמּֽוֹת׃ <sup>4209 </sup> <n>wicked devices</n>
8: הֶ֣רֶף <sup>7503 </sup> <n>Cease</n> מֵ֭אַף <sup>639 </sup> <n>from anger</n> וַעֲזֹ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and forsake</n> חֵמָ֑ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>wrath</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֝תְחַ֗ר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>fret</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>not thyself in any wise</n> לְהָרֵֽעַ׃ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>to do evil</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מְ֭רֵעִים <sup>7489 </sup> <n>For evildoers</n> יִכָּרֵת֑וּן <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n> וְקֹוֵ֥י <sup>6960 </sup> <n>but those that wait</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>upon the LORD</n> הֵ֣מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>they shall inherit</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n>
10: וְע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>Yet</n> מְ֭עַט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>For yet a little while</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>will be no</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>and the wicked</n> וְהִתְבּוֹנַ֖נְתָּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>[shall] not [be] yea thou shalt diligently consider</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> מְקוֹמ֣וֹ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>his place</n> וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>369 </sup> <n>more</n>
11: וַעֲנָוִ֥ים <sup>6035 </sup> <n>But the meek</n> יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall inherit</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וְ֝הִתְעַנְּג֗וּ <sup>6026 </sup> <n>and shall delight</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> רֹ֥ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>themselves in the abundance</n> שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of peace</n>
12: זֹמֵ֣ם <sup>2161 </sup> <n>plotteth</n> רָ֭שָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> לַצַּדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>against the just</n> וְחֹרֵ֖ק <sup>2786 </sup> <n>and gnasheth</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> שִׁנָּֽיו׃ <sup>8127 </sup> <n>upon him with his teeth</n>
13: אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>The Lord</n> יִשְׂחַק־ <sup>7832 </sup> <n>shall laugh</n> ל֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רָ֝אָ֗ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>at him for he seeth</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>is coming</n> יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that his day</n>
14: חֶ֤רֶב ׀ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> פָּֽתְח֣וּ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>have drawn out</n> רְשָׁעִים֮ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> וְדָרְכ֪וּ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and have bent</n> קַ֫שְׁתָּ֥ם <sup>7198 </sup> <n>their bow</n> לְ֭הַפִּיל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>to cast down</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>and needy</n> לִ֝טְב֗וֹחַ <sup>2873 </sup> <n>[and] to slay</n> יִשְׁרֵי־ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>such as be of upright</n> דָֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>conversation</n>
15: חַ֭רְבָּם <sup>2719 </sup> <n>Their sword</n> תָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall enter</n> בְלִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>into their own heart</n> וְ֝קַשְּׁתוֹתָ֗ם <sup>7198 </sup> <n>and their bows</n> תִּשָּׁבַֽרְנָה׃ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall be broken</n>
16: טוֹב־ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>hath [is] better</n> מְ֭עַט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>A little</n> לַצַּדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>that a righteous man</n> מֵ֝הֲמ֗וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>than the riches</n> רְשָׁעִ֥ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>wicked</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of many</n>
17: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> זְרוֹע֣וֹת <sup>2220 </sup> <n>For the arms</n> רְ֭שָׁעִים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> תִּשָּׁבַ֑רְנָה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall be broken</n> וְסוֹמֵ֖ךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>upholdeth</n> צַדִּיקִ֣ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>but the LORD</n>
18: יוֹדֵ֣עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knoweth</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the days</n> תְמִימִ֑ם <sup>8549 </sup> <n>of the upright</n> וְ֝נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <sup>5159 </sup> <n>and their inheritance</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be for ever</n> תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
19: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>They shall not be ashamed</n> בְּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>time</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>in the evil</n> וּבִימֵ֖י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and in the days</n> רְעָב֣וֹן <sup>7459 </sup> <n>of famine</n> יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>they shall be satisfied</n>
20: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>But</n> רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>But the wicked</n> יֹאבֵ֗דוּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> וְאֹיְבֵ֣י <sup>341 </sup> <n>and the enemies</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כִּיקַ֣ר <sup>3368 </sup> <n>[shall be] as the fat</n> כָּרִ֑ים <sup>3733 </sup> <n>of lambs</n> כָּל֖וּ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>they shall consume</n> בֶעָשָׁ֣ן <sup>6227 </sup> <n>into smoke</n> כָּֽלוּ׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>shall they consume away</n>
21: לֹוֶ֣ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>borroweth</n> רָ֭שָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>and payeth not again</n> וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>but the righteous</n> חוֹנֵ֥ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>sheweth mercy</n> וְנוֹתֵֽן׃ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and giveth</n>
22: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מְ֭בֹרָכָיו <sup>1288 </sup> <n>For [such as be] blessed</n> יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>of him shall inherit</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וּ֝מְקֻלָּלָ֗יו <sup>7043 </sup> <n>and [they that be] cursed</n> יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>of him shall be cut off</n>
23: מֵ֭יְהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>by the LORD</n> מִֽצְעֲדֵי־ <sup>4703 </sup> <n>The steps</n> גֶ֥בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>of a [good] man</n> כּוֹנָ֗נוּ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>are ordered</n> וְדַרְכּ֥וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his way</n> יֶחְפָּֽץ׃ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>and he delighteth</n>
24: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִפֹּ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>Though he fall</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוּטָ֑ל <sup>2904 </sup> <n>he shall not be utterly cast down</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> סוֹמֵ֥ךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>upholdeth</n> יָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[him with] his hand</n>
25: נַ֤עַר ׀ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>I have been young</n> הָיִ֗יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have been</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and now</n> זָ֫קַ֥נְתִּי <sup>2204 </sup> <n>and [now] am old</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> רָ֭אִיתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>yet have I not seen</n> צַדִּ֣יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> נֶעֱזָ֑ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>forsaken</n> וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>nor his seed</n> מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>begging</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n>
26: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הַ֭יּוֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[He is] ever</n> חוֹנֵ֣ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>merciful</n> וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>and lendeth</n> וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>and his seed</n> לִבְרָכָֽה׃ <sup>1293 </sup> <n>[is] blessed</n>
27: ס֣וּר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>Depart</n> מֵ֭רָע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>from evil</n> וַעֲשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> ט֗וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> וּשְׁכֹ֥ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and dwell</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for evermore</n>
28: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> אֹ֘הֵ֤ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>loveth</n> מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יַעֲזֹ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and forsaketh</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲ֭סִידָיו <sup>2623 </sup> <n>not his saints</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> נִשְׁמָ֑רוּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>they are preserved</n> וְזֶ֖רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>but the seed</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> נִכְרָֽת׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n>
29: צַדִּיקִ֥ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>The righteous</n> יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall inherit</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> וְיִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and dwell</n> לָעַ֣ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>therein for ever</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
30: פִּֽי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>The mouth</n> צַ֭דִּיק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <sup>1897 </sup> <n>speaketh</n> חָכְמָ֑ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>wisdom</n> וּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and his tongue</n> תְּדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>talketh</n> מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>of judgment</n>
31: תּוֹרַ֣ת <sup>8451 </sup> <n>The law</n> אֱלֹהָ֣יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>of his God</n> בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>[is] in his heart</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִמְעַ֣ד <sup>4571 </sup> <n>shall slide</n> אֲשֻׁרָֽיו׃ <sup>838 </sup> <n>none of his steps</n>
32: צוֹפֶ֣ה <sup>6822 </sup> <n>watcheth</n> רָ֭שָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> לַצַּדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> וּ֝מְבַקֵּ֗שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and seeketh</n> לַהֲמִיתוֹ׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>to slay</n>
33: יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יַעַזְבֶ֣נּוּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>will not leave</n> בְיָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him in his hand</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַ֝רְשִׁיעֶ֗נּוּ <sup>7561 </sup> <n>nor condemn</n> בְּהִשָּׁפְטֽוֹ׃ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>him when he is judged</n>
34: קַוֵּ֤ה <sup>6960 </sup> <n>Wait</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>on the LORD</n> וּשְׁמֹ֬ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and keep</n> דַּרְכּ֗וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>his way</n> וִֽ֭ירוֹמִמְךָ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>and he shall exalt</n> לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>thee to inherit</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> בְּהִכָּרֵ֖ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>are cut off</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>when the wicked</n> תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>thou shalt see</n>
35: רָ֭אִיתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I have seen</n> רָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> עָרִ֑יץ <sup>6184 </sup> <n>in great power</n> וּ֝מִתְעָרֶ֗ה <sup>6168 </sup> <n>and spreading</n> כְּאֶזְרָ֥ח <sup>249 </sup> <n>bay tree</n> רַעֲנָֽן׃ <sup>7488 </sup> <n>himself like a green</n>
36: וַ֭יַּֽעֲבֹר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Yet he passed away</n> וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and lo</n> אֵינֶ֑נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>was no</n> וָֽ֝אֲבַקְשֵׁ֗הוּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and lo he [was] not yea I sought</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>could</n> נִמְצָֽא׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>him but he could not be found</n>
37: שְׁמָר־ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Mark</n> תָּ֭ם <sup>8535 </sup> <n>the perfect</n> וּרְאֵ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[man] and behold</n> יָשָׁ֑ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>the upright</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַחֲרִ֖ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>for the end</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of [that] man</n> שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[is] peace</n>
38: וּֽ֭פֹשְׁעִים <sup>6586 </sup> <n>But the transgressors</n> נִשְׁמְד֣וּ <sup>8045 </sup> <n>shall be destroyed</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> אַחֲרִ֖ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>the end</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> נִכְרָֽתָה׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n>
39: וּתְשׁוּעַ֣ת <sup>8668 </sup> <n>But the salvation</n> צַ֭דִּיקִים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> מֵיְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[is] of the LORD</n> מָֽ֝עוּזָּ֗ם <sup>4581 </sup> <n>[he is] their strength</n> בְּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in the time</n> צָרָֽה׃ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n>
40: וַֽיַּעְזְרֵ֥ם <sup>5826 </sup> <n>shall help</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> וַֽיְפַ֫לְּטֵ֥ם <sup>6403 </sup> <n>them and deliver</n> יְפַלְּטֵ֣ם <sup>6403 </sup> <n>them he shall deliver</n> מֵ֭רְשָׁעִים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>them from the wicked</n> וְיוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and save</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> חָ֥סוּ <sup>2620 </sup> <n>them because they trust</n> בֽוֹ׃
